attributes.action: Keep Boris Johnson he is right to say what he did
attributes.additional_details: Motobiker have to take off my helmet to enter a secure area . BURKAS walk passed either sex who knows who they are
attributes.background: BORIS IS RIGHT I CAN'T FILL UP WITH PETROL OR WALK INTO A BANK WITHOUT REMOVING MY CRASH HELMET. YET BUKAS CAN WALK PAST ME WITHOUT A CHECK. MAKE OR FEMALE ANYBODY'S GUESS.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments. That includes calling for a Minister to be kept or removed from their job.
